alert.note: Alert for Clayton; Coweta; Fayette; Henry; Meriwether; Rockdale; Spalding; Troup (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 07 at 12:15AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Spalding, south central Rockdale, Fayette, northern Meriwether, northwestern Henry, northeastern Troup, eastern Coweta and Clayton Counties through 1245 AM EDT... At 1214 AM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Riverdale to near Thomas Crossroads to Hogansville, and moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Newnan, McDonough, Fayetteville, Jonesboro, Peachtree City, Stockbridge, Forest Park, Riverdale, Hampton, Tyrone, Morrow, Lovejoy, Senoia, Hogansville, Grantville, Luthersville, Brooks, Moreland, Sharpsburg and Turin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
